features: Antibacterial Mouthwash Provides 12-Hour Protection Against Germs After Eating and Drinking
Alcohol Free Mouthwash - No Burn of Alcohol (Does Not Contain Ethanol)
body.description: Colgate Total 12HR Pro-Shield Mouthwash doesn't just freshen breath, it provides 12-hour protection against germs, even after eating and drinking, helping to keep your mouth healthy and fresh. It kills 99% of germs on contact, significantly reduces plaque and helps prevent the gum disease gingivitis. Colgate Total 12HR Pro-Shield Mouthwash is an alcohol-free mouthwash (does not contain ethanol) and has a refreshing Peppermint Blast flavor. This antibacterial mouthwash offers germ protection for fresh breath.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Colgate Total 12HR Protection Mouthwash Colgate Total 12HR Protection Mouthwash provides 12-hour protection against germs, even after eating and drinking. The alcohol-free mouthwash formula doesn’t burn and keeps on working after brushing. For great results, use with Colgate Total Toothpaste.

Colgate Total 12HR Protection Colgate Total Gum Health Colgate Optic White Colgate Enamel Health Colgate Peroxyl Product Colgate Total Peppermint/Colgate Total Spearmint Mouthwash Colgate Total Gum Health Mouthwash Colgate Optic White Advanced Whitening Mouthwash Colgate Enamel Health Mouthwash Colgate Peroxyl Mouthwash Benefit 12HR protection against germs, even after eating and drinking. Clinically proven to help reverse gingivitis in 6 weeks- Fights plaque bacteria between teeth along the gum line. Actively whitens and seals out new stains by removing surface stains and helps to prevent new stains between brushing. Strengthens enamel even where brush may miss. Helps replenish natural calcium back into enamel. Cleans and promotes healing on minor oral wounds. Helps promote healing of mouth sores, irritations and mouth burns.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Just what i needed.
reviews.reviewText: Unable to purchase where i live. So this is what i was looking for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 10, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Colgate Total Pro Shield Alcohol Free Mouthwash The Healthier Mouthwash!!!
reviews.reviewText: I have been using Colgate Total Pro Shield Alcohol Free Mouthwash for many years. I was previously using Listerine mouthwash, but my Dentist said those mouthwashs containe Alcohol that burns gums and of course burning one's gums is not healthy. Mouthwashs that contains Alcohol have become out-dated for this important factor. If you are not using an Alcohol Free Mouthwash you should buy any brand of Alcohol Free Mouthwash right away and then pour your old Mouthwash with Alcohol in it down the drain, rember to Recycle the bottle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on March 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Great taste ... like that it is non alcoholic

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Peppermint in name only.
reviews.reviewText: It really doesn't taste like peppermint to me. But the taste is well within the normal, predictable range of concocted factory flavors found in many American oral care products. Inoffensive.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Less Tense Alcohol Flavor!
reviews.reviewText: I usually use Crest Mouthwashes but I just never liked that alcohol taste. So switching to colgate there is a huge difference in that intensity of Alcohol. Even though Crest mouthwashes always leave my mouth feeling completely clean after brushing , Colgate doesn’t really bring that clean feeling. Idk

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Product works as described
reviews.reviewText: No burning sensation is always a plus. Only negative is its not the best lingering taste, although my mouth feels clean it dosent really feal fresh. I will buy some kind of menthol flavor next time, just a personal preference.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Glad to find a mouthwash that has no alcohol
reviews.reviewText: Because alcohol dries out your mouth, I am very pleased to find one alcohol free. The taste is mildly minty, the effectiveness is quite good, so overall would I buy this again? Absolutely!The cost was about the same as those that contain alcohol.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Hard to find
reviews.reviewText: I used to purchase this at Walgreens and Walmart but because of Covid it is difficult to find. Great product.Use it in combination with Colgate Total Tootpaste
